content: **crocheted top in drops cotton light the piece is worked with lace pattern and straps sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern cluster-126 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **yarn** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150-200-200-250-250 g colour 22 brown khaki **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
